entry.title: NHLViewer beta performance affected
entry.summary: Earlier today, the beta service was affected heavily. I am currently monitoring for further evaluation.
entry.content:
Earlier today, the beta service was affected heavily. I am currently monitoring for further evaluation.

2022-10-24T08:53:10.000Z
Resolved

This issue has been resolved.

entry.title: NHLViewer beta upstream issue
entry.summary: We have detected downtime on one of our beta services utilizing Render. You can still use the stable version. Track the incident from Render here: https://status.render.com/incidents/mnmbhg8hl7kd
entry.content:
We have detected downtime on one of our beta services utilizing Render. You can still use the stable version. Track the incident from Render here: https://status.render.com/incidents/mnmbhg8hl7kd

2022-10-04T01:39:49.000Z
Identified

Render is still working on a fix for the downtime. No ETA at the moment.

2022-10-05T02:52:15.000Z
Resolved

Render has pushed out a fix and the beta service is now operational. If the issue arises again, this will be reopened.
